name: Let’s Build a Room
content: 别让他们说，别让他们告诉你战争的故事

Steal the gold in your heart

如果孤单很难熬，来吧
And take my hand
抓住我的双手
别害怕，我们一起战斗
To keep the cruelty out of our lives
将残酷赶出我们的生活
让我们建造一所房子，建造一所房子
Where only lovers inside can
只有爱人才能进入的房子
Breathe the air
呼吸空气
让我们建造一所房子，建造一所房子
Were the only thing is a bed

On the floor

I'm sure the birds in the trees

Can tell exactly how

The summers all over the land
